---
title: "IVSA-Rewards"
output: html_document
---

# 0. Load libraries

```{r, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

# 1. Load Data
```{r}
rewardTimes <- read_csv("~/Src/dataForPrototyping/2018-07-20_ICSS+IVSA_6H_FEMALES_BE22_rewards.csv")
corrLever <- read_csv("~/Src/dataForPrototyping/2018-07-20_ICSS+IVSA_6H_FEMALES_BE22_corrLever.csv")
incorrLever <- read_csv("~/Src/dataForPrototyping/2018-07-20_ICSS+IVSA_6H_FEMALES_BE22_incorrLever.csv")
```

# 2. Generate prelim plots

## 2.1. Proto-typing plot
```{r}
ggplot() +
  geom_histogram(data = corrLever, aes(x = CorrLever), binwidth = 60, color = "green", alpha = 0.5) +
  geom_histogram(data = incorrLever, aes(x = IncorrLever), binwidth = 60, color = "red", alpha = 0.5) +
  geom_histogram(data = rewardTimes, aes(x = Rewards), binwidth = 60, color = "grey", alpha = 0.7) +
  geom_rug(data = rewardTimes, aes(x = Rewards)) +
  xlim(c(0,21600))
```
